text: Public apps have to use their own backend using OAuth with REST API methods that the React front-end can connect with.  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/guides/crm/public-apps/overview>
You can only use the UI Components that HubSpot has built - you cannot create your own or modify existing components
Hi <@U04HWGVKYM7>, do you have any updates for us on this issue? Thank you

I don’t know about an exact copy of that component but I saw <@U01QVR44MEY> mentioned this in a post recently and maybe you can change the referenceObjectType to deals instead of tickets to achieve this? He used postman to create this property then you add this property to your ui extension. I haven’t tested it myself though
